pokemon.model
Class CartPokemon

java.lang.Object
  pokemon.model.Pokemon
      pokemon.model.CartPokemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CartPokemon
extends Pokemon
implements java.io.Serializable

Class which is derived from the pokemon-class and extends it by further features for handling pokemons in an onlineshop-cart

See Also:
